title: GTA+
headline: GTA+
subtitle: Albany Cavalcade XL
content:
GTA+ Members can claim the new Albany Cavalcade XL for free through February 7.

Post up and take up extra space on any block you please in the new Albany Cavalcade XL, a luxuriously oversized SUV that builds upon the Cavalcadeâ€™s established formula. GTA+ Members can also claim the Camo livery for the Albany Cavalcade XL from any Los Santos Customs, Auto Shop, or Vehicle Workshop location.

GTA+ Membership automatically renews monthly, cancel any time. Visit rsg.ms/gtaplus for more info.
button: Select to sign up to GTA+
